chaosweaver.name: Chaosweaver
chaosweaver.description: Monster is imbued with Chaos Damage and Resistance

frostweaver.name: Frostweaver
frostweaver.description: Monster is imbued with Cold Damage and Resistance

permafrost.name: Permafrost
permafrost.description: Monster has augmented Freeze and Chill powers

deadeye.name: Deadeye
deadeye.description: Monster is Accurate and applies Marks

bombardier.name: Bombardier
bombardier.description: Monster has augmented Projectile powers and periodically unleashes a barrage of mortars

flameweaver.name: Flameweaver
flameweaver.description: Monster is imbued with Fire Damage and Resistance

arcanebuffer.name: Arcane Buffer
arcanebuffer.description: Monster has augmented Energy Shield powers and releases a stunning nova when Energy Shield breaks

stormweaver.name: Stormweaver
stormweaver.description: Monster is imbued with Lightning Damage and Resistance

bonebreaker.name: Bonebreaker
bonebreaker.description: Monster has augmented Stun powers. Monster hits are slower and can't be evaded

bloodletter.name: Bloodletter
bloodletter.description: Monster has augmented Bleed powers. Monster Maims nearby enemies
bloodletter.extra: Items dropped from the Monster and its Minions are Corrupted

steelinfused.name: Steel-infused
steelinfused.description: Monster is imbued with Physical Damage and Physical Damage Reduction

gargantuan.name: Gargantuan
gargantuan.description: Monster is massive, granting more Life, Area of Effect, and Damage

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.description: Monster Enrages as it loses life

sentinel.name: Sentinel
sentinel.description: Monster is imbued with Block and Spell Block. Monster Triggers Reckoning when hit

juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
juggernaut.description: Monster cannot be Slowed or Stunned. Monster gains Endurance Charges

vampiric.name: Vampiric
vampiric.description: Monster has augmented Life Leech powers

overcharged.name: Overcharged
overcharged.description: Monster grants Charges to itself and Allies over time

soulconduit.name: Soul Conduit
soulconduit.description: On death, Monster and nearby Allies are revived

consecrator.name: Consecrator
consecrator.description: Monster periodically creates Consecrated Ground, healing allies and making them immune to curses and ailments

heraldingminions.name: Heralding Minions
heraldingminions.description: Monster's minions summon invulnerable Lightning Totems on death

empoweringminions.name: Empowering Minions
empoweringminions.description: Monster's minions are empowered. Minions empower the Monster with additional modifiers on death

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.description: Monster has augmented Critical powers and has Shroud Walker

trickster.name: Trickster
trickster.description: Monster has damage avoidance. Monster periodically Flees

necromancer.name: Necromancer
necromancer.description: Monster can raise Undead. Minions are empowered and revive shortly after dying
necromancer.extra: Rewards are rolled 2 additional times, choosing the rarest result

rejuvenating.name: Rejuvenating
rejuvenating.description: Monster has Life Regeneration. Periodically releases a wave that heals nearby allies and prevents enemy Life and Energy Shield recovery
rejuvenating.extra: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

executioner.name: Executioner
executioner.description: Monster gains Damage based on missing enemy Life. Monster has an aura that prevents enemies recovering Life and Energy Shield above 50%

hexer.name: Hexer
hexer.description: Monster is Hexproof. Monster is followed by a Hexing Effigy that creates Hexing areas

droughtbringer.name: Drought Bringer
droughtbringer.description: Monster disables Flask effects on hit. Monster has an aura that drains Flask charges and prevents gaining Flask charges

entangler.name: Entangler
entangler.description: Monster creates Thorned Vines that slow and deal Chaos Damage over time.

temporalbubble.name: Temporal Bubble
temporalbubble.description: Monster is protected by a Temporal Bubble that severely slows those in it and cannot be damaged by those outside of it

treanthorde.name: Treant Horde
treanthorde.description: Monster's minions are replaced with powerful Treants. Some Damage taken from the monster is split between the Treants
treanthorde.extra: Monster's Minions drop a randomly-chosen Reward Type

froststrider.name: Frost Strider
froststrider.description: Monster leaves Chilling Ground in its wake. Minions create Frost Bearers on death

iceprison.name: Ice Prison
iceprison.description: Monster periodically entraps players in a cage of ice
iceprison.extra: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

souleater.name: Soul Eater
souleater.description: Monster empowers when nearby allies die. Periodically summons Phantasms

flamestrider.name: Flame Strider
flamestrider.description: Monster leaves Burning Ground in its wake. Minions create Flame Bearers on death

corpsedetonator.name: Corpse Detonator
corpsedetonator.description: Monster detonates nearby Corpses. Monster periodically creates Corpses

evocationist.name: Evocationist
evocationist.description: Monster is imbued with Elemental Damage, Resistances and Ailments

magmabarrier.name: Magma Barrier
magmabarrier.description: Monster is protected by a Magmatic shield that explodes when depleted. Monster periodically creates Volatile Flamebloods
magmabarrier.extra: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

mirrorimage.name: Mirror Image
mirrorimage.description: Monster can create illusions of itself
mirrorimage.extra: Rewards are rolled 2 additional times, choosing the rarest result

stormstrider.name: Storm Strider
stormstrider.description: Monster leaves Shocking Ground in its wake and spawns Lightning Mirages when hit. Minions create Storm Bearers on death

manasiphoner.name: Mana Siphoner
manasiphoner.description: Monster is surrounded by a ring that deals Lightning Damage over time as well as draining Mana
manasiphoner.extra: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

corrupter.name: Corrupter
corrupter.description: Monster inflicts Corrupted Blood on Hit and when Hit. Minions create Corrupted Bubbles on death
corrupter.extra: Items dropped from the Monster and its Minions are Corrupted

invulnerable.name: Invulnerable
invulnerable.description: Monster and its Minions periodically become immune to all Damage. Minions cannot die while Monster is alive

crystalskinned.name: Crystal-skinned
crystalskinned.description: Monster triggers the creation of Crystals when hit. Crystals explode when the Monster dies

empoweredelements.name: Empowered Elements
empoweredelements.description: Monster cycles between imbued damage of a particular type and immunity to all other damage types
empoweredelements.extra: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

effigy.name: Effigy
effigy.description: Monster creates an Effigy of the player. Damage dealt to the Effigy is also reflected to the bonded player
effigy.extra: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

lunaristouched.name: Lunaris-touched
lunaristouched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Lunaris
lunaristouched.extra: All Reward Types have an additional reward

solaristouched.name: Solaris-touched
solaristouched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Solaris
solaristouched.extra: All Reward Types have an additional reward

arakaalitouched.name: Arakaali-touched
arakaalitouched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Arakaali
arakaalitouched.extra: All Reward Types are Divination Cards

brinekingtouched.name: Brine King-touched
brinekingtouched.description: Monster uses the abilities of the Brine King
brinekingtouched.extra: Rewards are rolled 6 additional times, choosing the rarest result

tukohamatouched.name: Tukohama-touched
tukohamatouched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Tukohama
tukohamatouched.extra: Rewards are rolled 4 additional times, choosing the rarest result

abberathtouched.name: Abberath-touched
abberathtouched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Abberath
abberathtouched.extra: Rewards are rolled 4 additional times, choosing the rarest result

shakaritouched.name: Shakari-touched
shakaritouched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Shakari

innocencetouched.name: Innocence-touched
innocencetouched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Innocence

kitavatouched.name: Kitava-touched
kitavatouched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Kitava
